resources.string: can you take pictures under the water?
Underwater devices use a uniform system of framing (check if it is true).
With some cameras, you can avoid the parallax error by using the correction marks in the viewfinder (check if it is true).
When you want to take picture under the water you should...
When you want to take picture close to the bottom you should...
For most types of underwater photography is the best angle (insert either upward or horizontal).
a. hold the camera with both hands, if possible.
b. always have one hand free for adjusting buoyancy.
b. keep a stable position by using fins.
